subtask:
Create a CloudFormation template to establish the target AWS infrastructure for migrating an on-premises loan processing system.

MANDATORY REQUIREMENTS (Must complete):
1. Deploy RDS Aurora MySQL cluster with one writer instance (CORE: RDS Aurora)
2. Create Lambda function for loan validation with 1GB memory (CORE: Lambda)
3. Configure S3 bucket for loan documents with versioning enabled
4. Set up VPC with public and private subnets across 2 AZs minimum
5. Implement Secrets Manager for database credentials with 30-day rotation
6. Create CloudWatch Log Groups with 90-day retention for all services
7. Use Parameters for environment type (dev/prod) and instance sizes
8. Apply Conditions to control multi-AZ deployment based on environment

OPTIONAL ENHANCEMENTS (If time permits):
� Add Application Load Balancer for future web interface (OPTIONAL: ALB) - prepares for UI migration
� Implement SQS queue for async loan processing (OPTIONAL: SQS) - improves throughput
� Add EventBridge for loan status notifications (OPTIONAL: EventBridge) - enables event-driven architecture

Expected output: A single CloudFormation JSON template that creates all infrastructure components ready to receive migrated data and applications from the on-premises system.
